_header: Holy Maiden blessed Thou be / Gods son is born of Thee
Subjects: carols, to the Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: A song in praise of the Virgin Mary — seven quatrains (aaaa) with refrain ‘Regina celi letare’, and burden: ‘Synge we to this mery cumpane / Regina celi letare’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
Holy maide blessyd þu begodys sone is born of
                    þe…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…With this songe of melodeRegina celi
                    letare
